Items.Title: Application number N 230288 ZRK (230 Kent Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Kent Riverview, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying provisions of Article XII, Chapter 3 (Special Mixed Use District) and APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 1, Council District 33.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 230 Kent Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 230288 ZRK)

Items.Title: Application number C 230289 ZMK (230 Kent Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Kent Riverview, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 12c, changing from an M1-4 District to an M1-4/R7X District and establishing a Special Mixed Use District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 1, Council District 33.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 230 Kent Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 230289 ZMK)

Items.Title: Application number N 230288 ZRK (230 Kent Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Kent Riverview, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying provisions of Article XII, Chapter 3 (Special Mixed Use District) and APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 1, Council District 33.
